snippet: Mitt Romney responded to President Obama's endorsement of same-sex marriage by drawing a contrast with his own oft-repeated view that "marriage is a relationship between a man and a woman."
abstract: Mitt Romney responded to President Obama's endorsement of same-sex marriage by drawing a contrast with his own oft-repeated view that "marriage is a relationship between a man and a woman."

headline.main: Romney Draws Contrast, but Does Not Hammer Obama on Gay Marriage

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
